name: Mountain Girl
description: Mountain Girl by Pilot Farm is a sun-grown, high elevation strain rooted in native soil on a steep mountainside overlooking the Colestin valley in Southern Oregon. This cross of Willy’s Wonder, Granddaddy Purple, and White Widow is an uplifting strain that comes with insatiable appetite stimulation. Mountain Girl’s aroma is sweet and earthy with a skunky finish. This strain is good for improving mood and front-loading creativity, but mind your dosage, as the intense euphoria can be overwhelming for uninitiated consumers.
descriptionPlain: Mountain Girl by Pilot Farm is a sun-grown, high elevation strain rooted in native soil on a steep mountainside overlooking the Colestin valley in Southern Oregon. This cross of Willy’s Wonder, Granddaddy Purple, and White Widow is an uplifting strain that comes with insatiable appetite stimulation. Mountain Girl’s aroma is sweet and earthy with a skunky finish. This strain is good for improving mood and front-loading creativity, but mind your dosage, as the intense euphoria can be overwhelming for uninitiated consumers.

highlightedReviews.text: While I wouldn't call this strain mind-blowing, what it does do for you is really great. Mountain Girl is the ultimate for simple, noodling activities. So....baking, or cleaning, coloring, knitting, etc. I love to have this around the house for when I need to do some spring cleaning, or I just want to laundry, and find yourself singing while you get some stuff done that is normally so mundane you can't handle it.
Great for gardeningüçÉüåù The 8% CBD helped with the pain üåª
